name: Play Or Die
description:
WAIT A FEW SECONDS BEFORE IT LOADS...THERE IS NO LOADING SCREEN BUT I SWEAR IT LOADS!

You are a pianist, who is stuck in a house with a psycho. you will have to play sweet melodies to keep him asleep or else he will kill you ( and dont make any mistakes ).

SORRY NO SOUNDS OR MUSIC FOR NOW. I WILL ADD SOUNDS LATER. <3

Controls:-

Controls are simple you just have to hit the right arrow key which appears on the top of the piano.
